message: Let's be reasonable, I'll take a bit more but you'll still get a good chunk.
Your turn Alice, but let's not waste time. This offer is fair and the clock is ticking.
I'll take a bit more, considering the money's losing value. Let's settle this!
Alice, let's be realistic.  We're running out of time and the value is plummeting. A 50/50 split is the fairest and fastest way to end this.
